title: The Immortal King In The City - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mature   Mystery   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Acting   Arrogant Characters   Battle Academy   Betrayal   Cheats   Conditional Power   Cultivation   Immortals   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Overpowered Protagonist   Revenge   Second Chance   Weak to Strong
author: 尼米
description:
'What's wrong with me? Was I being hunted by more than ten Xianzuns in the mysterious realm? Why am I here?'

Li Feng looked expressionless. He let the stream of people pass by him. The rain fell on his face. The rain was cold, telling him that this was not a dream!

He was reborn! 

He returned to the time when he just finished the National College Entrance Examination!

The Immortal King reborn the earth in the time of crisis. This life, all the regrets will no longer exist! All who have trodden on me will know what cruelty is!>
